text: int arr [ 101 ] [ 100 ] ; int result [ 101 ] ; int r = 0 ; int main ( ) { int t , n , l = 0 , i , j , max , p , q , sum , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { max = 0 ; sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( max < arr [ n - 1 ] [ k ] ) { max = arr [ n - 1 ] [ k ] ; p = n - 1 ; q = k ; } } sum = max ; for ( k = n - 2 ; k >= 0 ; k -- ) { if ( arr [ p - 1 ] [ q ] > arr [ p - 1 ] [ q - 1 ] ) { sum = sum + arr [ p - 1 ] [ q ] ; p -- ; } else { sum = sum + arr [ p - 1 ] [ q - 1 ] ; p -- ; q -- ; } } result [ l ] = sum ; l ++ ; t -- ; } l -- ; for ( ; r <= l ; r ++ ) printf ( "%d\n" , result [ r ] ) ; return 0 ; }
